EmailTemplate.subject: Real-Time, All the Time
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/reserved-instance-rightsizing-with-turbonomic-6-1/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Don’t get caught using legacy approaches and stale information when making decisions on your cloud and on-premises environment.
Turbonomic ensures performance without sacrificing your cloud budgets. It drives the most effective use of both on-demand and Reserved Instance for cloud computing without compromising performance.
Please check out this blog post <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/reserved-instance-rightsizing-with-turbonomic-6-1/]]> to learn more about how we can help.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
